article: Ask your boss or professor for directions. If you are writing an article for work or school, make sure you understand the assignment. Set aside a few minutes to talk to your boss and ask your questions. This should be done before you begin writing to avoid having to redo the entire assignment [1]. Suppose your boss has asked you to write an article for the company newsletter. Find out if there is a specific topic you need to write about and how long the article should be.
